content: val REPOSITORIES_DATA = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Kotlin/dataframe/master/data/jetbrains_repositories.csv" val df = DataFrame.read(REPOSITORIES_DATA).cast<Repository>() // Use generated properties to access data in rows df.maxBy { stargazers_count }.print() // Or to access columns in dataframe. print(df.full_name.count { it.contains("kotlin") })
pageTitle: Working with Data Schemas in Gradle project
